name: Who Am I?
description:
Who Am I? is a game where you can create your own Identity and explore a world as that identity.

Create a character by customising their clothes, name and Sexual and Gender Identity. You may find this reflects in later parts of the game.

Converse with the characters you find and hear more about the characters and purchase accessories to further refine your identity.

This game was developed for #RainbowJam16.
